entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 26 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 early this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 26 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 39 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023
